name: TAMA-GOTH-I: My Monster Pet [GAME JAM]
description:
THERE ARE NO INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED IN-GAME, SORRY! PLEASE READ THE BULLET POINTS BELOW.

Tama-goth-i is a very simple pet game made in 7 days for Scream Jam 2021! You can feed your ghost, play with it and dress it up in hats. Keep your ghost happy and alive!

Although I wasn't able to finish many of the ideas I had for this pet sim, I'm really happy with how it ended up - even though it's more of a concept/toy than actual pet sim. My original idea was to have multiple horror monsters for pets, such as vampires and zombies but realized the art would eat up too much time. I can also see a couple of other issues but I feel this was a great learning experience and I'd love to expand on it in future! (Not for a while though, the last day crunch is real lol)

Features

  • Cozy and relaxing lofi music
  • Buy hats for your ghost
  • Ghost target practise minigame
  • Buy items for your room

Instructions

  • Feed the ghost by dragging food from the Food Bar into the ghost
  • Click the door to go outside!
  • Make the ghost to sleep by turning off the lights (but make sure they're tired!)
  • Clean the ghost by dropping the sponge onto them
  • If sick, drop medicine onto ghost to cure it
  • If Ghost dies, hit the reset button
  • Click the football to play with the ghost
  • Click the cosmetic items on the second right bar to toggle between your owned cosmetics!
  • Get money by playing Target Practise!
